prompt.description: The text prompt describing the content, style, or composition of the image to be generated.

image.description: The image to be edited. Enter the Base64 encoding of the picture or an accessible URL. Image URL: Make sure that the image URL is accessible. Base64-encoded content: The format must be in lowercase.

negative_prompt.description: The description of elements to avoid in the generated image.

watermark.description: Add an invisible watermark to the generated images.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

b64_json.description: The base64-encoded JSON of the generated image.

tokens_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -L \
  --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.aimlapi.com/v1/images/generations' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
      "model": "alibaba/qwen-image-edit",
      "prompt": "Add a crown to the T-rex\'s head.",
      "image": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aimlapi/api-docs/main/reference-files/t-rex.png"
    }'

POST /v1/images/generations HTTP/1.1
Host: api.aimlapi.com
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: */*

{
  "model": "alibaba/qwen-image-edit",
  "prompt": "Add a crown to the T-rex's head.",
  "image": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aimlapi/api-docs/main/reference-files/t-rex.png"
}
